trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dexter
There were no other sightings in Dexter on or around September 4th 1989
Summary: three sighting just had to share
divs: sighting detailsgot up to smoke a cig. the people next door were have a party and they were all fussing about somthing in the sky so i when out side and started looking around in the sky and found what they weere looking at it was not from here i live in corrina at the time there were these little probe coimg out from underneath this crafe one headed newport way and the other headed torwards greedvilles way these little probe came and left in the blink of a eye the were gone for about five mins. and simply just show up back under the crafe. just wanted to share with you this is my third sighting of crafes my first one was in fla. in 69 were i saw thee mother ship it was so close i thoght i could have reach out and touch it but the second one in n.c. in 1980 at a family reuion got up to pee when out side my father bought a house that was a old tobacoo farm so there was a lot of cleared land around there so i was doing my bezzness i heard this very high pitched sound not loud but high pitch so i stared looking around for this sound and found this craft about 100 yards away 100 feet in the sky shaking like a old drunks hands so im watching this thing for about 2\3 mins and i kid you not all of a sudden this craft stared melting kinda like if you were to take a peice of plactic put a match to it at night and it kinda of melts in diff.colors this is just what this thing did it was the most beutaful ara of color that i have ever saw this felling came over me like i was in the middle of the making of a rainbow i never seen such bright color in my life, anyways all these color kinda flowed like a river of color towards the ground and as they got close to the ground they just disaperd i mean nothing hit the ground and it just stoped, now im kinda hiding behind this tree thinking shit what the hell was that and i no longer ggot that thought out of my mind and a in the exact place the other craft was another one just show up there no light nothing it was just there, shot this beem of light down there it went dark and about 1 min. later asecond craft show up there light came on and it vanished in the blink of a eye. crazy stuff. do i belive you bet.scott.
